title: Chat restricted discussion
body:
so i got chat restricted recently and ik why and im not appealing.i jsut feel like chatting.
Game 1
In-Game

In-Game
Xa Warudo: i start red
Xa Warudo: damn
Xa Warudo: ekko top
Xa Warudo: no mana
Xa Warudo: fuck
Xa Warudo: ;/
Xa Warudo: idk how bot is losing
Xa Warudo: 2v2
Xa Warudo: welp gg
Xa Warudo: u lost 2v2 at bot i legit dk how
Xa Warudo: welp gg
Xa Warudo: idk how bot is losing 2v2
Xa Warudo: a
Xa Warudo: and garen is building triforce instead of BC into ornn
Xa Warudo: naice
Xa Warudo: go next
Xa Warudo: yall are braindead
Xa Warudo: guess i got outjungled
Xa Warudo: yall are so bad ifu lose dis so u better win
Xa Warudo: muted :)
Xa Warudo: ggs :)
Xa Warudo: go end
Xa Warudo: i srsly dk how bot is losing 2v2
Xa warudo: or garen isnt building BC

idk why is dis listed as one of the reason why i got chat restricted apart from other things.
except"yall are braindead" which was a joke for a funny play.
so dis game started im a jgler,i make perfect ganks and everything and the enemy even complimented me yet we sstill lost sucks but whatever what do yall think?shud dis game chat be counted as "toxic behavior".im not cursing anyone,im just pointing out facts and whats going on.theres no harassment except "yall are braindead"because they legit lost 1v4 its like one of those bronze plays and still flames the jgler ;/.one by one dying
just a friendly discussion,im not appealing or anything i just saw this and confuse why and how is that a toxic behavior,im not much a nice guymyself maybe someone could point that out to me?

replies.body: Blaming bot lane, saying dumbass statements like "idk how bot is losing 2v2"... like, are you okay? What do you mean you dont know how? Its a pvp game. Soooo naturally the other players (their opponents) outplayed them. No shit. How is that a hard thing to figure out? Also, calling people braindead and bad. These are what we call insults. They are against the rules. Duh. My god. And im guessing english isnt your first language, its "this" not "dis". That just makes you sound like a moron, but its understandable if english isnt your native language, which youre doing pretty good at it, btw.
Its the same whena support with around 5 vision score at 20mins asking the jungler how did he died in our jungle lol

> [{quoted}](name=Tele II,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rRiNIVTG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-02-19T03:16:44.732+0000)
>
> Blaming bot lane, saying dumbass statements like "idk how bot is losing 2v2"... like, are you okay? What do you mean you dont know how? Its a pvp game. Soooo naturally the other players (their opponents) outplayed them. No shit. How is that a hard thing to figure out? Also, calling people braindead and bad. These are what we call insults. They are against the rules. Duh. My god. And im guessing english isnt your first language, its "this" not "dis". That just makes you sound like a moron, but its understandable if english isnt your native language, which youre doing pretty good at it, btw

Toxiccc

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-
https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/summoners-code
I suggest you read the simple rules of LoL. Rules that you have agreed to respect when you accepted Terms of Use.
You got chat restricted because all you did in chat all game is flame people. Next!
there are lots of better games and you should stop wasting your life on this sub-par game product
